00001 package newtonERP.viewers.secondStep;
00002 
00003 import java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException;
00004 import java.net.URLEncoder;
00005 
00006 import newtonERP.viewers.Viewer;
00007 import newtonERP.viewers.viewerData.PageSelector;
00008 
00013 public class PageSelectorViewer
00014 {
00015 
00020         public static String getHtmlCode(PageSelector pageSelector)
00021 
00022         {
00023                 String html = "";
00024 
00025                 html += "<div class=\"PageSelector\">";
00026 
00027                 int pageCount = pageSelector.getPageCount();
00028                 int limit = pageSelector.getCurrentLimit();
00029                 int offset = pageSelector.getCurrentOffset();
00030                 String searchEntry = pageSelector.getCurrentSearchEntry();
00031                 String orderBy = pageSelector.getOrderBy();
00032                 try
00033                 {
00034                         searchEntry = URLEncoder.encode(searchEntry, Viewer.getEncoding());
00035                         orderBy = URLEncoder.encode(orderBy, Viewer.getEncoding());
00036                 } catch (UnsupportedEncodingException e)
00037                 {
00038                         throw new RuntimeException(e);
00039                 }
00040 
00041                 if (offset > 0)
00042                         html += "<a href='"
00043                                         + pageSelector.getCurrentUrl()
00044                                         + "?limit="
00045                                         + limit
00046                                         + "&amp;offset="
00047                                         + (offset - limit)
00048                                         + "&amp;searchEntry="
00049                                         + searchEntry
00050                                         + "&amp;orderBy="
00051                                         + orderBy
00052                                         + "'><img src='/file/images/blueLeftArrow.gif' alt='gauche' style='border:0px' /></a>";
00053                 else
00054                         html += "<img src='/file/images/blackLeftArrow.gif' alt='gauche' />";
00055 
00056                 for (int linkCounter = 0; linkCounter < pageCount; linkCounter++)
00057                 {
00058                         int currentLinkOffset = limit * linkCounter;
00059 
00060                         if (currentLinkOffset != offset)
00061                                 html += " <a href='" + pageSelector.getCurrentUrl() + "?limit="
00062                                                 + limit + "&amp;offset=" + linkCounter * limit
00063                                                 + "&amp;searchEntry=" + searchEntry + "&amp;orderBy="
00064                                                 + orderBy + "'>";
00065                         else
00066                                 html += " ";
00067 
00068                         html += (linkCounter + 1);
00069 
00070                         if (currentLinkOffset != offset)
00071                                 html += "</a>";
00072                 }
00073 
00074                 if (offset + limit < pageSelector.getTotalRowCount())
00075                         html += " <a href='"
00076                                         + pageSelector.getCurrentUrl()
00077                                         + "?limit="
00078                                         + limit
00079                                         + "&amp;offset="
00080                                         + (offset + limit)
00081                                         + "&amp;searchEntry="
00082                                         + searchEntry
00083                                         + "&amp;orderBy="
00084                                         + orderBy
00085                                         + "'><img src='/file/images/blueRightArrow.gif' alt='droit' style='border:0px' /></a>";
00086                 else
00087                         html += " <img src='/file/images/blackRightArrow.gif' alt='droit' />";
00088 
00089                 html += "</div>";
00090 
00091                 return html;
00092         }
00093 }
